channel.title: Looking for a Clean Base [317]
channel.description:
Yes, I know this sounds simple, but to be specific, I'm looking for a source and client that leans towards the use of an IDE. I'm not too great with programming private servers (basic java programs, yes), but I'm willing to learn and want to start somewhere from scratch that has combat included. I'm wanting to make my own skills and if possible, learn how to edit the cache without a cache editor.
So if you can't help me with a base/source, at least fill me in on how to edit the cache raw.
Thank you.
